title: SET_PED_PROP_INDEX
content:
0x829F2E2// SetPedPropIndex
void SET_PED_PROP_INDEX(Ped ped, int componentId, int drawableId, int textureId, BOOL attach);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.componentId: The component that you want to set. Refer to SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION.drawableId: The drawable id that is going to be set. Refer to GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS.textureId: The texture id of the drawable. Refer to GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_PROP_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS.attach: Attached or not.This native is used to set prop variation on a ped. Components, drawables and textures IDs are related to the ped model.MP Freemode list of props0: Hats
1: Glasses
2: Ears
6: Watches
7: Bracelets
List of Prop IDsenum eAnchorPoints
{
ANCHOR_HEAD = 0, // "p_head"
ANCHOR_EYES = 1, // "p_eyes"
ANCHOR_EARS = 2, // "p_ears"
ANCHOR_MOUTH = 3, // "p_mouth"
ANCHOR_LEFT_HAND = 4, // "p_lhand"
ANCHOR_RIGHT_HAND = 5, // "p_rhand"
ANCHOR_LEFT_WRIST = 6, // "p_lwrist"
ANCHOR_RIGHT_WRIST = 7, // "p_rwrist"
ANCHOR_HIP = 8, // "p_lhip"
ANCHOR_LEFT_FOOT = 9, // "p_lfoot"
ANCHOR_RIGHT_FOOT = 10, // "p_rfoot"
ANCHOR_PH_L_HAND = 11, // "ph_lhand"
ANCHOR_PH_R_HAND = 12, // "ph_rhand"
NUM_ANCHORS = 13,
};
This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native SET_PED_PROP_INDEX.
codeBlocks:
// SetPedPropIndex
void SET_PED_PROP_INDEX(Ped ped, int componentId, int drawableId, int textureId, BOOL attach);

enum eAnchorPoints
{
ANCHOR_HEAD = 0, // "p_head"
ANCHOR_EYES = 1, // "p_eyes"
ANCHOR_EARS = 2, // "p_ears"
ANCHOR_MOUTH = 3, // "p_mouth"
ANCHOR_LEFT_HAND = 4, // "p_lhand"
ANCHOR_RIGHT_HAND = 5, // "p_rhand"
ANCHOR_LEFT_WRIST = 6, // "p_lwrist"
ANCHOR_RIGHT_WRIST = 7, // "p_rwrist"
ANCHOR_HIP = 8, // "p_lhip"
ANCHOR_LEFT_FOOT = 9, // "p_lfoot"
ANCHOR_RIGHT_FOOT = 10, // "p_rfoot"
ANCHOR_PH_L_HAND = 11, // "ph_lhand"
ANCHOR_PH_R_HAND = 12, // "ph_rhand"
NUM_ANCHORS = 13,
};

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_PED_PROP_INDEX
SetPedPropIndex(ped, 0, 0, 0, false)
